verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Aijeleth <S%H365><s%> Shahar, <S%H7842><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> My God, <S%H410><s%> my God, <S%H410><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> have you forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me? why are you so far <S%H7350><s%> from helping <S%H3467><s%> me, and from the words <S%H1697><s%> of my roaring? <S%H7581><s%>
O my God, <S%H430><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> in the day time, <S%H3119><s%> but you hear <S%H6030><s%> not; and in the night <S%H3915><s%> season, and am not silent. <S%H1747><s%>
But you are holy, <S%H6918><s%> O you that inhabit <S%H3427><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Our fathers <S%H1><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> in you: they trusted, <S%H982><s%> and you did deliver <S%H6403><s%> them.
They cried <S%H2199><s%> to you, and were delivered: <S%H4422><s%> they trusted <S%H982><s%> in you, and were not confounded. <S%H954><s%>
But I am a worm, <S%H8438><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> and despised <S%H959><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> they that see <S%H7200><s%> me laugh <S%H3932><s%> me to scorn: they shoot <S%H6362><s%> out the lip, <S%H8193><s%> they shake <S%H5128><s%> the head, <S%H7218><s%> saying,
He trusted <S%H1556><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that he would deliver <S%H6403><s%> him: let him deliver <S%H5337><s%> him, seeing he delighted <S%H2654><s%> in him.
But you are he that took <S%H1518><s%> me out of the womb: <S%H990><s%> you did make me hope <S%H982><s%> when I was on my mother's <S%H517><s%> breasts. <S%H7699><s%>
I was cast <S%H7993><s%> on you from the womb: <S%H7358><s%> you are my God <S%H410><s%> from my mother's <S%H517><s%> belly. <S%H990><s%>
Be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me; for trouble <S%H6869><s%> is near; <S%H7138><s%> for there is none <S%H369><s%> to help. <S%H5826><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> have compassed <S%H5437><s%> me: strong <S%H47><s%> bulls of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> have beset <S%H3803><s%> me round. <S%H3803><s%>
They gaped <S%H6475><s%> on me with their mouths, <S%H6310><s%> as a ravening <S%H2963><s%> and a roaring <S%H7580><s%> lion. <S%H738><s%>

I am poured <S%H8210><s%> out like water, <S%H4325><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> are out of joint: <S%H6504><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is like wax; <S%H1749><s%> it is melted <S%H4549><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my bowels. <S%H4578><s%>

My strength <S%H3581><s%> is dried <S%H3001><s%> up like a potsherd; <S%H2789><s%> and my tongue <S%H3956><s%> sticks <S%H1692><s%> to my jaws; <S%H4455><s%> and you have brought <S%H8239><s%> me into the dust <S%H6083><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>

For dogs <S%H3611><s%> have compassed <S%H5437><s%> me: the assembly <S%H5712><s%> of the wicked <S%H7489><s%> have enclosed <S%H5362><s%> me: they pierced <S%H738><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> and my feet. <S%H7272><s%>
I may tell <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my bones: <S%H6106><s%> they look <S%H5027><s%> and stare <S%H7200><s%> on me.
They part <S%H2505><s%> my garments <S%H899><s%> among them, and cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> on my clothing. <S%H3830><s%>
But be not you far <S%H7368><s%> from me, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> O my strength, <S%H360><s%> haste <S%H2363><s%> you to help <S%H5833><s%> me.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the sword; <S%H2719><s%> my darling <S%H3173><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the dog. <S%H3611><s%>
Save <S%H3467><s%> me from the lion's <S%H738><s%> mouth: <S%H6310><s%> for you have heard <S%H6030><s%> me from the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the unicorns. <S%H7214><s%>
I will declare <S%H5608><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> to my brothers: <S%H251><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation <S%H6951><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> you.

You that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> him; all <S%H3605><s%> you the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> glorify <S%H3513><s%> him; and fear <S%H1481><s%> him, all <S%H3605><s%> you the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For he has not despised <S%H959><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> abhorred <S%H8262><s%> the affliction <S%H6039><s%> of the afflicted; <S%H6041><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has he hid <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from him; but when he cried <S%H7768><s%> to him, he heard. <S%H8085><s%>
My praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be of you in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation: <S%H6951><s%> I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him.

The meek <S%H6035><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied: <S%H7646><s%> they shall praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that seek <S%H1875><s%> him: your heart <S%H3824><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> for ever. <S%H5703><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the world <S%H776><s%> shall remember <S%H2142><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you.
For the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> is the LORD's: <S%H3068><s%> and he is the governor <S%H4910><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> they that be fat <S%H1879><s%> on earth <S%H776><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and worship: <S%H7812><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they that go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him: and none <S%H3808><s%> can keep alive <S%H2421><s%> his own soul. <S%H5315><s%>
A seed <S%H2233><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him; it shall be accounted <S%H5608><s%> to the Lord <S%H136><s%> for a generation. <S%H1755><s%>
They shall come, <S%H935><s%> and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> that shall be born, <S%H3205><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> this.
